name: Gallery of Emotion
description:
Gallery of Emotion facilitates a calm environment where you can collect falling balls of paint to paint a canvas. Try and finish them all with as many different colour's as you can.

You are a lone artist who is inspired by Mark Rothko’s painting style. You can paint new or over previous paintings found in your personal gallery by collecting falling balls of colour. You can walk around the gallery to view your large art pieces with a comfortable first-person controller.
